website_summaries.verdict: A versatile unisex design with large lenses that are comfortable to wear.
pros: Sunglasses look good on square, oval, or heart-shaped faces
Big lenses do a good job of protecting the eyes
Good vision clarity in various light conditions
cons: Lenses not as dark as some of Electric’s other models, which bothers some customers

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and Light! Love Them!
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for a few months now and I love them. I take pretty good care of them and they still look as good as new. You almost don't even feel them on they're so light! The hinges have a tendency to get loose, but maybe it's the way I wear them (but how else do you wear sunglasses?) but it's nothing a little screw driver can't fix! I've had these for several months and only recently tightened them. Either way, love the product.
customer_reviews.author: Jon M.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t believe how cheap these were. My husband has had a few pairs of electrics and they always lasted a long time, but recently he lost his only pair. I bought these for his birthday and was so disappointed when I opened the box. They felt like knock-offs you’d find from a street vendor. I had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: They are not as big as they look
customer_reviews.text: Really light and cool shades with a black mat finish
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: ... described - this is my second pair and I love them.
customer_reviews.text: Just as described - this is my second pair and I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsey D.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They fit the shape of my face perfect , and very comfortable!!
customer_reviews.author: Charly

customer_reviews.title: They were bigger than I thought.. but thats ...
customer_reviews.text: They were bigger than I thought.. but thats what you get for buying glasses online without trying them on.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Looking good.
customer_reviews.text: I love these shades! They look great! There is no paint chipping or easy scratching, and the lenses don't scratch too easy! I was worried that these would look huge on my face but they look awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sam Rothstein would buy them...
customer_reviews.text: These things are huge, but I like them. I feel like Sam Rothstein wearing them. Lenses have good clarity. They can slide off easily.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Wilcox

customer_reviews.title: Stylish
customer_reviews.text: Love them, light weight and look very stylish, recommended to all my friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia Esquivel

customer_reviews.title: Item Scratched!
customer_reviews.text: The item says new and the glasses are scratched on the bottom and have greasy finger print on lense. Super disappointed as these were a gift! So embarrassing that they are scratched when opened out of the box!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love the frame of the glasses
customer_reviews.text: I love the frame of the glasses, I have a square shaped head so it was the right size for me. I do wish the lenses were a bit darker but it still protected my eyes from the sun. Also, it comes is a cloth bag, the gasses tend to get out of the bag when stored in my purse.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Quintans

customer_reviews.title: Keeping b/c Sale.
customer_reviews.text: The colors are much more muted than I expected and the frames are much lighter. However, I got this pair for 30 so I can't complain.
customer_reviews.author: Logicmyth

customer_reviews.title: Great glasses!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! Larger than normal lenses wish are designed solely for that purpose. Great fit! Looks stylish! Excellent high end build quality.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Sobol

customer_reviews.title: Love them. They are lite weight and good size
customer_reviews.text: Love them. They are lite weight and good size. I have a big head and always buy big sunglasses. I'd say the frame is a medium size. Not big but not small. I'm a girl and totally dig them
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: my second pair of black top! it really looks clean!
customer_reviews.author: drew

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: Great buy...wasn't sure about the brand until i received these. Love them!! Very good quality especially for the price. Will be buying some more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Steven hernandez

customer_reviews.title: As promised :)
customer_reviews.text: Excellent conditions, as promised. The only suggestion will be to specify if the sunglasses were polarized, because I never saw it in the description.
customer_reviews.author: David Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: love em
customer_reviews.text: Light weight and comfortable you forget you are wearing them. The only problem is keeping my friends from stealing them!
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit. Nice and clean. Fresh out of the box!
customer_reviews.author: Blake Gill

customer_reviews.title: Babes. Beers. & BBQ's.
customer_reviews.text: Zack Morris never leaves home without them. Perfect for checking out the surf and the occasional sun-kissed long butts in Malibu.
customer_reviews.author: Zack Morris

product_meta.title: Electric Vsual Black Top Sunglasses
product_meta.description: Electric Visual is a leading manufacturer of sunglasses, goggles, and accessories in the action sports industry. All of their products are tested through their extensive team in the harshest of conditions. All products are made with the highest quality materials on the market. The brand strives to give you products that make you feel good about yourself, and will last the test of time.
feature_bullets: FIT:Large frame ideal for square, oval and heart shape faces.
OPTICS: 100% UV Protection. 98% Blue Light Protection from Melanin.
TINT:OHM Grey (VLT - 10%) Optimal for daily use in bright sunlight
